results.title: A2Z: Stories that shaped Kerala in 2024
ISL 2024-25: NorthEast United Ends Year With Clinical 3-0 Victory Over Mumbai City FC
results.description: NorthEast United FC defeated Mumbai City FC 3-0 at the Mumbai Football Arena in an Indian Super League (ISL) 2024-25 match on Monday. Despite keeping 65.2 per cent of the possession, Mumbai City FC could take only three shots on target

results.title: ISL 2024-25 mid-term grades: Mohun Bagan A, Mumbai City C, Kerala Blasters F
results.description:
Kochi, Dec 16 (PTI) — Kerala Blasters FC, one of the prominent football clubs in the Indian Super League (ISL), has officially announced the termination of services of their head coach, Mikael Stahre. The decision, which comes midway through the ongoing season, marks a significant change in the club's leadership and strategic direction.  

Stahre, who took over as head coach earlier this year, was brought in with high expectations to elevate the team's performance and competitiveness. However, the team's recent performances under his stewardship have fallen short of expectations, prompting the management to make this tough decision.  

The announcement was made on Monday, with the club thanking Stahre for his contributions and wishing him the best in his future endeavors. Despite a promising start, Kerala Blasters struggled to find consistency in their gameplay, leading to a series of underwhelming results. This has left fans and stakeholders disappointed, with the team's position in the league table failing to reflect the potential of its talented roster.  

In a statement, the club emphasized its commitment to delivering top-tier football and reaffirmed its dedication to achieving long-term success. The management is expected to announce an interim or replacement coach in the coming days as they look to regain momentum and turn their season around.  

Kerala Blasters FC remains one of the most passionately supported teams in the ISL, and this decision underscores the club's resolve to meet the high standards set by its loyal fanbase. As the team navigates this transitional phase, fans will be keenly watching for updates on the next steps in the club's journey.  

The departure of Stahre highlights the challenges and pressures of professional football, where results often dictate tenure. For now, Kerala Blasters will focus on regrouping and preparing for the crucial fixtures ahead in the season.

results.title: Sports News | Korou Singh Signs Contract Extension with Kerala Blasters FC Until 2029
results.description: Get latest articles and stories on Sports at LatestLY. Indian Super League (ISL) outfit Kerala Blasters FC announced that young attacker Korou Singh Thingujam has signed a contract extension with the club until 2029.
